InsertBefore will insert a child [Gecko.DOMNode DOMNode] before another [Gecko.DOMNode DOMNode]. If the function succeeds, it will return the new child node, otherwise it will return false.

==Parameters==
|| *Name* || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| NewChild || [Gecko.DOMNode DOMNode] || The node to be inserted |
|| RefChild || [Gecko.DOMNode DOMNode] || The node that the new node should be before |
